technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, such as the uncertainty and fear surrounding the initial outbreak.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation with their partner, asking questions and sharing their own experiences, but did not go above and beyond to build off of the conversation partner's story.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation, sharing their experiences and asking questions of their partner.
defensiveness: The participant did not display any defensiveness in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
questions: What was your pandemic experience like? [00:08:18]
Did you experience any side effects? [00:11:00]
similarity_statements: I feel like mine was similar. [00:09:22]
vaccine_importance: The participant seems to believe that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant seems to believe that boosters are extremely important.
